thread.title: Coast Guard searching for missing fisherman near Cocodrie
thread.title_full: Coast Guard searching for missing fisherman near Cocodrie - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Coast Guard searching for missing fisherman near Cocodrie
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - The Coast Guard, Terrebonne Parish Sheriff’s Department and Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries are searching for a reportedly missing oyster fisherman near Cocodrie.
According to Coast Guard, authorities were notified by the Terrebonne Parish Sheriff’s Department around 6:30 p.m. Friday that Tommy Newsome was reportedly last seen by other fishermen Oct. 19.
Newsome’s boat is reportedly an aluminum hull boat with a white cabin. It was reported to have a tarp aboard as well.
A Coast Guard MH-65 Dolphin helicopter was launched after receiving the initial notification, and rescuers searched by helicopter again Saturday morning.
The Terrebonne Sheriff’s Department is on scene as well as Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries.
Anyone who may have information regarding Newsome is encouraged to call: 504-365-2209.
